About Me

Some information about myself.

BIO

My name is Olav Elias Riksheim. I'm 17 years old and I was born on 6th of July 2001. I go to Fagerlia High School, and live in Sykkylven. My address is Myreryggen 8, 6222 Ikornnes, Norway.

My home

I live in a large, red house in Sykkylven. It was built in 2001, and is therfore the same age as I am. The colors of the house are red, white and grey.

Hobbies

My organized hobbies are scouting, and marching band, where I play the trombone. On my own time I also like to play videogames, read books and practice mathematics and programming.

This website

This website is made for the Information Techonolgy 1 course. The pages: Our Digital Age, Websites and Multimedia, Databases and Report, are made for this course. The rest are made for myself and other who wish to view them.
